name: Bark Bark Bark (Ema)
description:
Bark Bark Bark 🍗

Feed the dog turn by turn, but be careful once her belly is filled she will bite !  The number of nuggets you must give her are dictated by a dice, the more you feed her, the more chance you get to be bitten. Good luck !

Bark Bark Bark can be played as a game or as an alternative for heads or tails. 

🍗🐶

Made in more or less three hours for the Trijam ! As always, a lot of stress but a lot of fun (I really wanted to draw hands last night). 

The theme was "Fill the Vacuum" I understood that as "providing something needed or missing" (from google) so here I present to you an hungry dog.

Music by Hammer of Hathor and sounds from Zapslat

You can follow me on twitter
